title: plx give me rps ty riot
body:
http://imgur.com/a/Dhzhm

i need 1280 rps ty riote supporte

replies.body: Ayyyyyy haven't seen Susan in awhile! 1280 is a biiiiiit too much RP for our Gift RP Art program, but if you're a small amount away (think in the double digits)  from that next skin or something feel free to hit us back up!
Ohhhh! I only need a little RP to get a nice Chroma! If I draw a cool picture will that be sufficient exchange? :D
